## Description {#details}

An instruction for reading from memory.

This uses the SubclassData field in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> to store whether or not the load is volatile.

Definition at line 176 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

## Private Member Attributes

### SSID {#a2e57cd6a2e4658f06a7612360849f1f0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="SyncScope::ID llvm::LoadInst::SSID">
The synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of this load instruction.

Not quite enough room in SubClassData for everything, so synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> gets its own field.
